HomePage.title: Welcome to
HomePage.about: TesteBac prepares students for the baccalaureate or university admission exam. This platform is dedicated to students who want to test their knowledge and prepare for the important exams of their lives. The platform uses a grid test system, which provides instant feedback and helps students improve their knowledge. The tests are structured by subjects and chapters, to provide the most efficient and personalized preparation. To get started, choose the subject and chapter you want and press the start button. Good luck with your studies!

userNotAuthorized.title: Registration not accepted yet
userNotAuthorized.message:
Please wait for your registration to be validated by a moderator. This may take up to 24 hours. 

If you have any questions, please contact us at {email}.
userNotAuthorized.short: You need to be authorized to access the app.

Old.subject: Sign in to TesteBac
Old.title: Sign in to TesteBac ({host})
Old.message:
Thank you for registering on TesteBac. Your registration is pending approval by a moderator. This process may take up to 24 hours. 

If you have any questions, please contact us at {email}.
Old.disclaimer: If you did not request this email you can safely ignore it. You can try to login but you will receive an error now. You will be able to login after your registration is approved by a moderator.
Old.text_alt: If you have trouble clicking the "{signIn}" button, copy and paste the URL below into your web browser: {signInLink}

MagicLink.subject: Sign in to TesteBac
MagicLink.title: Sign in to TesteBac ({host})
MagicLink.message: This link will only be valid for the next 24 hours.
MagicLink.disclaimer: If you did not request this email you can safely ignore it. Contact support if you have any questions at {email}.

verifyRequest.title: Verify your email address
verifyRequest.message: We have sent you an email with a link to verify your email address. Please check your inbox and click on the link in the email to access the app.

OAuthSignin.title: Authorization Failed
OAuthSignin.description: We couldn't create the authorization URL. Please try again later.

OAuthCallback.title: Login Error
OAuthCallback.description: There was a problem processing the response from the login provider. Please try again.

OAuthCreateAccount.title: Account Creation Failed
OAuthCreateAccount.description: We couldn't create your account using this login provider. Please try again or use a different method.

EmailCreateAccount.title: Email Registration Failed
EmailCreateAccount.description: We couldn't create your account with this email. Please try again later.

Callback.title: Login Callback Error
Callback.description: Something went wrong while processing your login request. Please try again.

OAuthAccountNotLinked.title: Account Not Linked
OAuthAccountNotLinked.description: This email is linked to another login method. Please use the original method to sign in.

EmailSignin.title: Email Sign-In Failed
EmailSignin.description: We couldn't send the verification email. Please check your email address and try again.

CredentialsSignin.title: Login Failed
CredentialsSignin.description: Your login details are incorrect. Please check them and try again.

SessionRequired.title: Sign-In Required
